simple-dark.title: Simple Dark Card
simple-dark.subtitle: With subtitle
simple-dark.paragraph: A basic card with dark variant, title, subtitle and paragraph. Perfect for simple content.

simple-light.title: Simple Light Card
simple-light.paragraph: Card with light variant featuring only title and paragraph, without subtitle.

dark-hover.title: Dark Hover Card
dark-hover.subtitle: Interactive variant
dark-hover.paragraph: Card with hover effect that changes background on mouse over.

light-hover.title: Light Hover Card
light-hover.paragraph: Light card with interactive hover effect.

with-icon.title: Card with Icon
with-icon.subtitle: Using card-header slot
with-icon.paragraph: Card with icon in header using the card-header slot.

with-action.title: Card with Action
with-action.subtitle: Using card-footer slot
with-action.paragraph: Card with button in footer using the card-footer slot.

center-aligned.title: Center Aligned
center-aligned.subtitle: Text alignment center
center-aligned.paragraph: Card with center alignment for all text content.

right-aligned.title: Right Aligned
right-aligned.subtitle: Text alignment right
right-aligned.paragraph: Card with right alignment for desktop and center for mobile.

complete.title: Complete Card
complete.subtitle: With all features
complete.paragraph: Complete card with header icon, footer button and all available elements.

full-custom.title: Full Custom
full-custom.paragraph: Card with fully customized content using the fullCustomContent prop.

multi-action.title: Multi-Action Card
multi-action.subtitle: Multiple footer buttons
multi-action.paragraph: Card with multiple actions in footer for complex scenarios.

loading-state.title: Loading State
loading-state.subtitle: Button with loading
loading-state.paragraph: Card showing loading state in the button.

simple.title: Simple Dialog
simple.subtitle: Small size dialog
simple.content: This is a simple dialog with basic content. Dialogs are useful for displaying information or requesting user input without navigating away from the current page.

medium.title: Medium Dialog
medium.subtitle: Medium size dialog
medium.content: This dialog has a medium size, perfect for forms or more detailed content. You can add any content you want inside the dialog body slot.

large.title: Large Dialog
large.subtitle: Large size dialog
large.content: This is a large dialog that provides more space for complex content. It's ideal for displaying detailed information, long forms, or rich media content.

with-header.title: Dialog with Custom Header
with-header.subtitle: Using the header slot
with-header.header-content: This is a custom header section that appears between the title and the body. You can add any custom content here.
with-header.content: The body content goes here. The custom header slot is useful for adding warnings, alerts, or additional information.

with-footer.title: Dialog with Footer Actions
with-footer.subtitle: Using the footer slot
with-footer.content: This dialog demonstrates the footer slot where you can add action buttons. This is perfect for forms or confirmation dialogs.

confirmation.title: Confirm Action
confirmation.subtitle: Are you sure?
confirmation.content: This action cannot be undone. Please confirm that you want to proceed with this operation.

text.label: Text Input
text.hint: This is a text input field

checkbox.label: Checkbox
checkbox.text: I agree to the terms and conditions

footer.made-with: Designed and developed with ❤ by Stefano Biddau
